Text: Thanks much. We F1 fans in the States really appreciate your efforts.
Many thanks. Much appreciated. We F1 fans in Australia appreciate your efforts too, because the Aussie edition of F1 Racing is rubbish.

Thanks for those kind words. At the moment I am really pushed for time so my uploads are not to many at present.If I miss something please let me know and I will do my best.By mid Oct I should be running at full steam and will have some great F1 uploads for you.Many thanks Spetses.
thanks a ton man. really appreciate your efforts.
